title: Requirements Gathering and Analysis
description: Gather system requirements from stakeholders, analyze them, and create a comprehensive list of functional and non-functional requirements. Collaborate with the team to ensure that requirements are clear, complete, and prioritized.

title: System Design and Architecture Definition
description: Design the system architecture considering scalability, reliability, and real-time requirements. Create UML diagrams and flowcharts for better understanding.

title: Database Design and Implementation
description: Design and implement the database schema to store energy consumption data, grid status, and other relevant information.

title: Frontend Development for User Interface
description: Develop the user interface for users to interact with the system, including real-time energy consumption visualization and control options.

title: Backend Development for Core Functionality
description: Implement the core functionality of the system, including real-time energy distribution optimization algorithms.

title: DevOps Setup and Configuration
description: Set up the development environment, configure continuous integration/continuous deployment pipelines, and prepare for scalable deployments.

title: Testing and Quality Assurance
description: Test the system for functional correctness, performance, security, and usability. Identify issues and report them for resolution.

title: Code Review and Audit
description: Review the codebase to ensure adherence to best practices, cleanliness, maintainability, and security. Identify areas for improvement.

title: Documentation and Technical Writing
description: Write comprehensive documentation for the Distributed Energy Management System, including user manuals, API reference documents, development guidelines, and system architecture overviews. Collaborate with cross-functional teams to ensure accuracy, consistency, and comprehensiveness.
